trans-unit.source: Unable to write into the file. Please open the file to correct errors/warnings in the file and try again.
trans-unit.target: 無法寫入檔案.請開啟檔案並修正錯誤/警告後再試一次.

trans-unit.source: Unable to write into the file because the file is dirty. Please save the file and try again.
trans-unit.target: 無法寫入檔案,因為檔案已變更.請儲存檔案後再試一次

trans-unit.source: Open Tasks Configuration
trans-unit.target: 開啟工作組態

trans-unit.source: Open Launch Configuration
trans-unit.target: 開啟啟動組態

trans-unit.source: Open Settings
trans-unit.target: 開啟設定

trans-unit.source: Save and Retry
trans-unit.target: 儲存並重試

trans-unit.source: Unable to write to {0} because {1} is not a registered configuration.
trans-unit.target: 因為 {1} 非已註冊的組態，所以無法寫入至 {0}。

trans-unit.source: Unable to write {0} to Workspace Settings. This setting can be written only into User settings.
trans-unit.target: 無法寫入 {0} 至工作區設定。此設定只能寫入使用者設定中。

trans-unit.source: Unable to write {0} to Workspace Settings. This setting can be written only into User settings.
trans-unit.target: 無法寫入 {0} 至工作區設定。此設定只能寫入使用者設定中。

trans-unit.source: Unable to write to Folder Settings because {0} does not support the folder resource scope.
trans-unit.target: 因為 {0} 不支援資料夾資源範圍，所以無法寫入至資料夾設定。

trans-unit.source: Unable to write to User Settings because {0} does not support for global scope.
trans-unit.target: 因為 {0} 不支援全域範圍，所以無法寫入至使用者設定。

trans-unit.source: Unable to write to Workspace Settings because {0} does not support for workspace scope in a multi folder workspace.
trans-unit.target: 因為 {0} 不支援多資料夾工作區中使用工作區範圍，所以無法寫入工作區設定。

trans-unit.source: Unable to write to Folder Settings because no resource is provided.
trans-unit.target: 因為未提供資源，所以無法寫入至資料夾設定。

trans-unit.source: Unable to write to Language Settings because {0} is not a resource language setting.
trans-unit.target: 因為 {0} 不是資源語言設定，所以無法寫入語言設定。

trans-unit.source: Unable to write to {0} because no workspace is opened. Please open a workspace first and try again.
trans-unit.target: 因為未開啟工作區，所以無法寫入至 {0}。請先開啟工作區，再試一次。

trans-unit.source: Unable to write into the tasks configuration file. Please open it to correct errors/warnings in it and try again.
trans-unit.target: 無法寫入工作組態檔。請開啟它以更正其中的錯誤/警告，然後再試一次。

trans-unit.source: Unable to write into the launch configuration file. Please open it to correct errors/warnings in it and try again.
trans-unit.target: 無法寫入啟動組態檔。請開啟它以更正其中的錯誤/警告，然後再試一次。

trans-unit.source: Unable to write into user settings. Please open the user settings to correct errors/warnings in it and try again.
trans-unit.target: 無法寫入使用者設定。請開啟它以更正其中的錯誤/警告，然後再試一次。

trans-unit.source: Unable to write into remote user settings. Please open the remote user settings to correct errors/warnings in it and try again.
trans-unit.target: 無法寫入遠端使用者設定。請開啟遠端使用者設定，以更正當中的錯誤/警告，並再試一次。

trans-unit.source: Unable to write into workspace settings. Please open the workspace settings to correct errors/warnings in the file and try again.
trans-unit.target: 無法寫入工作區設定。請開啟工作區設定檔案以修正其中的錯誤/警告，然後重試一次。

trans-unit.source: Unable to write into folder settings. Please open the '{0}' folder settings to correct errors/warnings in it and try again.
trans-unit.target: 無法寫入資料夾設定。請開啟 '{0}' 資料夾設定以修正其中的錯誤/警告，然後重試一次。

trans-unit.source: Unable to write into tasks configuration file because the file is dirty. Please save it first and then try again.
trans-unit.target: 因為檔案已變更，無法寫入工作組態檔。請先儲存，然後再試一次。

trans-unit.source: Unable to write into launch configuration file because the file is dirty. Please save it first and then try again.
trans-unit.target: 因為檔案已變更，無法寫入啟動組態檔。請先儲存，然後再試一次。

trans-unit.source: Unable to write into user settings because the file is dirty. Please save the user settings file first and then try again.
trans-unit.target: 因為檔案已變更，所以無法寫入使用者設定。請儲存使用者設定檔案，然後再試一次。

trans-unit.source: Unable to write into remote user settings because the file is dirty. Please save the remote user settings file first and then try again.
trans-unit.target: 因為檔案已變更，所以無法寫入遠端使用者設定。請先儲存遠端使用者設定檔案，再重試一次。

trans-unit.source: Unable to write into workspace settings because the file is dirty. Please save the workspace settings file first and then try again.
trans-unit.target: 因為檔案已變更，所以無法寫入工作區設定。請儲存工作區設定檔案，然後再試一次。

trans-unit.source: Unable to write into folder settings because the file is dirty. Please save the '{0}' folder settings file first and then try again.
trans-unit.target: 因為檔案已變更，所以無法寫入資料夾設定。請儲存 '{0}' 資料夾設定檔案，然後再試一次。

trans-unit.source: Unable to write into tasks configuration file because the content of the file is newer.
trans-unit.target: 因為檔案內容較新，所以無法寫入工作組態檔。

trans-unit.source: Unable to write into launch configuration file because the content of the file is newer.
trans-unit.target: 因為檔案內容較新，所以無法寫入啟動組態檔。

trans-unit.source: Unable to write into user settings because the content of the file is newer.
trans-unit.target: 因為檔案內容較新，所以無法寫入使用者設定。

trans-unit.source: Unable to write into remote user settings because the content of the file is newer.
trans-unit.target: 因為檔案內容較新，所以無法寫入遠端使用者設定。

trans-unit.source: Unable to write into workspace settings because the content of the file is newer.
trans-unit.target: 因為檔案內容較新，所以無法寫入工作區設定。

trans-unit.source: Unable to write into folder settings because the content of the file is newer.
trans-unit.target: 因為檔案內容較新，所以無法寫入資料夾設定。
